.. _apptainer_sif_new:

apptainer sif new
-----------------

Create SIF image

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Create a new, empty SIF image.

::

  apptainer sif new <sif_path>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::

  sif new image.sif

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for new

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer sif <apptainer_sif>` 	 - Manipulate Singularity Image Format (SIF) images
